p: Methanol extracts of L. mollissima assayed against D6 strains of P. falciparum were also significantly more active ( P < 0.05) than dichloromethane extracts. The IC 50 values of D6 strain were significantly different from those of W2 strain ( P < 0.05) for the methanolic extracts of T. brownii, S. pinnata, Z. chalybeum, T. diversifolia (leaves and flowers), and S. africana ( P < 0.05) with the extracts exhibiting higher suppression on D6 strain than on the W2 strain ( Table 2).
